title: BullFlag
author: BullFlag
content: BullFlag (BFL) to launch on November 7th#What is BullFlag (BFL)BullFlag is a BEP20 token that features an auto buyback and burn functionality that utilizes the true burn mechanism of 2% of every transaction and removes it from the supply.#TokenomicsBFL encompasses a 1% Development, 2% True Burn, 2% Buyback and a 4% Marketing#BFL Supply100,000,000 BFL initial supply at launch preceding verified burns and supply reductions.#Development TeamThe incumbent team have successfully launched prior projects such as DogeVillage (https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/dogevillage) and Elonâ€™s Currency (https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/elons-currency).The project team has obtained a KYC certificate from Cyberscope (https://github.com/cyberscope-io/kyc/blob/main/1-bfl/kyc.png) and has had the contract successfully audited (https://github.com/cyberscope-io/audits/blob/main/1-bfl/audit.pdf)For more visit https://thebullflag.com/
